title: E minor melodic dictation - treble, compound met.

content.description: Notate on the staves provided the correct pitch and rhythm of a short melody that you will hear.
content.question: The melody will be played four times. There will be a pause of 30 seconds after the first playing and a 1-minute pause after each subsequent playing. There are no rests in the melody you will hear. It will be played on a saxophone.

frqParts.text: The melody will be played four times. There will be a pause of 30 seconds after the first playing and a 1-minute pause after each subsequent playing. There are no rests in the melody you will hear. It will be played on a saxophone.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Notate the pitches and rhythm of a performed melody (in treble or bass clef; in a major or minor key; may include chromatically altered pitches).
